title: Bacon Sandwich
content:
Bacon Sandwich is a category of item. It can be cooked in The Delectable Dab Kitchen in Hopeport using the Chef profession. Recipes for the Chef profession can be found in the Chef Recipe Book. Bacon Sandwiches can be sold to Head Chef.


 * Basic Bacon Sandwich
 * Appetizing Bacon Sandwich
 * Fine Bacon Sandwich
 * Tasty Bacon Sandwich
 * Delicious Bacon Sandwich
 * Gourmet Bacon Sandwich
